pkgmetadata.longdescription: Obtain a List of Publications from 'PubMed' and 'Google Scholar' // Use web scraping for 'PubMed'(https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov) and 'Google Scholar' profile page (for example https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=lOOV8rwAAAAJhl=en) to get all of the published information from the search page. Then placing it on a table.
